channel.title: Endserver code in autorestarter
channel.description:
I am working on my autorestarter and yes I have the start server part, basic, but I need the part that [b]ends[/b] the server first... anyone have the code? what I have currently is...
[code]@echo off cls echo Stopping Server... tskill java /a echo Restarting Server... title Jonsmodscape java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server cls[/code]
and it gives me this error when I run it (with my server currently on)
[code]Stopping Server... 'tskill' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Restarting Server... Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use? [/code]
I have this error because my server does not close... help? THANKS! :D[br][size=1]Posted at: November 02, 2006, 11:00:35 PM[/size][hr]pleeeeeeeeeeeeeeaaaaaaaaaaaaaaasssssssssseeeeeeeeeeee I'm not patient lol

item.title: Endserver code in autorestarter
item.dc:creator: @jonyo jonyo
item.description:
@jonyo wrote:

[quote=“DAWIGG, post:2, topic:21658”]@echo off
title camscape Server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

here try this[/quote]

thanks for trying but thats the start server code I need the end server code[br][size=1]Posted at: November 02, 2006, 11:24:52 PM[/size][hr]bump

please I have everything schedule and everything else set up its just when I run it it doesn’t close the server window before starting it up again so I get port already in use

Read full topic
